events.description: Adley Rutschman singles on a ground ball to center fielder Lawrence Butler.

Gunnar Henderson pops out to second baseman Zack Gelof on the infield fly rule. 1 out
Austin Hays walks. Adley Rutschman to 3rd. Ryan Mountcastle to 2nd.
